name: Space Pit Escape Mini-Game
description:
Submission for my first game jam! Use WASD to move and SPACE to jump. Reach the top to win as fast as you can!

There is a graphical bug on ultrawide screens where the timer and buttons are too close to the middle of the screen and overlap the level a bit. There is no sound and some of the animations are a bit janky, but it's my first attempt at a 3D game and I only had 48 hours. lol
